PluginData.Author: Rednight
PluginData.Tooltip: This mod removes the Offline and Online textures from LCD & Text Panels
PluginData.Description:
This mod makes the Offline and Online textures from LCD & Text Panels transparent
This is to avoid having those textures flashing when a LCD/Text panel comes back into character view distance but its content isnt rendered yet.
Very practical if you use a transparent LCD in front of a camera.
